The Great Mouse Detective

Based on the popular Disney movie, this delightful mystery combines suspense with top-notch mouse sleuthing skills in an rollicking tale that’s sure to keep young readers intrigued. Mouse detective Basil of Baker Street foils villain Ratigan’s plot to kidnap the queen and replace her with a replica that he can manipulate and use to become the ruler of England. Despite the challenges he encounters along the way, Basil demonstrates determination and doggedness by pursuing the trail of clues.

Tie-in Activity: Stage your own “whodunit” by hiding a toy, and then leave a trail of clues for your child to follow. For added fun, provide him with detective tools, such as a magnifying glass and little black notebook, to use during his search.
